title: looking for bot lane
body:
hey guys, trying to recruit a bot lane for our team. must be skype users and happy to game mostly through the weekdays (nights from 5-6pm aest) we play alot of normals for fun but are looking to play more ranked when we have a confident team, if interested please message me for details. can message me here on facebook (https://www.facebook.com/shanerstevenson) or ad me on league (ToxicEkko)
a little info about our rolls
Vincent Luke - top main best champ/s. zed,mord,shivana +
secondary role/s - kill lane
Dougie Moore - Mid main best champ/s. yasuo,sejuani,teemo +
secondary role/s - top
Shane Stevenson - jg main best champ/s. ekko,leona,vi +
secondary role/s - support

replies.body:
I am Silver 3 and an AD carry main
IGN: Xquishy
Best champions: Lucian, Vayne, Ezreal, Jinx
Can play all AD carries obviously some better than others but I am willing to put in the time to learn different champions to a better skill cap.

Hey there :D
Gold V and a support main
